title: Are electrons a part of the atom, or are electrons and atoms two separate things? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you take the hydrogen component away from H20 it’s no longer water. Similarly, if you take the electrons away from an atom you no longer have an atom. Electrons are as much a part of the atom as the nucleus is.
electron is part of atom. atom consist of neutron, proton, and electron.
